import React from 'react' import Rahul from './Img/Rahul.png' import top2 from './Img/top2.png' import top3 from './Img/top3.png' import top4 from './Img/top4.png' function TopPlacement({Handleactivate}) { return ( <>

Rahul Thapliyal

MicroSoft

(2016-20)

) } export default TopPlacement
